summary: In an alternate Japan, territorial street gangs form opposing factions collectively known as the Tokyo Tribes. Merra, leader of the Wu-Ronz tribe of Bukuro crosses the line to conquer all of Tokyo. The war begins.
cast: Ryôhei Suzuki|Young Dais|Nana Seino|Shunsuke Daitô|Takuya Ishida|Yui Ichikawa|Bernard Ackah|Joey Beni|Arata Matsuura|Yûki Ishii|Makoto Sakaguchi|Kokone Sasaki|Hideo Nakano|Hisako Ôkata|Akira Yamamoto|Akio Joe|Yoshiyuki Yamaguchi|Akihiro Kitamura|Yoshihiro Takayama|Motoki Fukami|Hitomi Katayama|Hiroko Yashiki|Haruna Yabuki|Cyborg Kaori|Mao Mita|Miyuki Yokoyama|Shintaro Hazama|Hirokazu Tategata|Yuki Izumisawa|Stephanie|Santa Inoue|Mika Kanô|Shôko Nakagawa|Kunihiko Kawakami|Mega-g|D.O.|Neri-Motha Fuckerz|Ego|Simon|Ys|Kohh|Tokage|Young Hastle|Loota|Vito Foccacio|Dj Ken Watanabe|Vikn|Mary Jane|Anarchy|Jesse|Denden|Aki Hiraoka|Joey Iwanaga|Tomoko Karina|Yôsuke Kubozuka|Tony Nakajima|Satoshi Nishikôri|Pacman|Alex Paille|Arisa Sakamoto|Ryûta Satô|Shôta Sometani|Riki Takeuchi|Takeshi James Yamada
title: Tokyo Tribe
